title: Abby Kessler Center for Acupressure and Acupuncture in Newton, MA
description: Abby Kessler Center for Acupressure Acupuncture in Newton, MA offers chinese herbal medicine, acupuncture, acupressure, shiatsu, massage serving Newton, Boston, Wellesley, Watertown, Waltham, Massachusetts since 1990.
cleaned_text: For 30 years, Abby's office was located on Washington Street, at the corner of Walnut Street in Newtonville. To provide her patients with the cleanest, safest and most controlled environment during the Covid-19 era and beyond, Abby has moved her practice to nearby 132 Tolman Street, West Newton, MA 02465. The setting is peaceful and the view is lovely... you can hear birdsong during your treatment. The Abby Kessler Center for Acupressure and Acupuncture in Newton, MA has been serving the Newton since 1990. Her office is convenient to the Mass Pike, I-95, Newton, Waltham, Wellesley, Weston and surrounding areas. Abby has completed extensive training in shiatsu, acupressure and other forms of Asian style bodywork. Her years of experience manipulating Qi directly with her hands informs her unique and client-centered approach to acupuncture. [Her unique combination of moxabustion and Chinese herbal medicine, have made her one of the leading practitioners in the region. Abby's goal is to help her patients become healthy, pain-free and educated about natural and non-toxic methods for attaining and maintaining their health. She makes sure that all her patients are given a thorough explanation of their condition and a full tool-kit of individualized lifestyle recommendations to support their health and well-being. Abby also offers [online tele-health consultations](https://www.abbykessler.com/services) and makes house calls for house bound patients (there is an additional charge for travel time and expense). Her office has easy on-site parking and only four stairs to navigate for those with mobility issues.
